name: GRIM (Caligo Aliway)
description:
A top down hack 'n' slash with procedural elements. You play as the Grim Reaper, who out of boredom, was reincarnated into a mortal soul reaper.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD keys to move
Spacebar to Attack/Reap

Red bar is your health.
White bar is DEATH MODE meter.

Every time you reap a soul, the white bar would fill up.
When the white bar is full, PRESS Q to activate DEATH MODE.
During DEATH MODE, you use MOUSE to click and drag over souls
to wipe them out. Once the white bar is depleted, DEATH MODE will end.

This is still pretty much a very early prototype. The demo is a survive as long as you can type of game, but it won't represent the final gameplay.
